11.content: Is it for humiliation or to really take care of her?
11.title: Momma Heather?

112.content:
Gwen and Heather were enraged at each other! They both had their share of annoying each other (like when Gwen dumped all the RED ants in Harold's ant farm on her after Justin got voted off, and the time Heather exposed Gwen's panties during the first phase of the 10th challenge) but they really screwed got screwed today. Chris's challenge for today was to work together (chained by handcuffs) and win 3 rounds of challenges, Owen got chained to Geoff (I know thats not how it went, but just bear with it), Leshawna was chained to Duncan and Gwen was chained to Heather.

During the challenge they really did a total on each other. But they only good thing was that they won, they were both slightly eased by this, but not by much. Heather was in her cabin thinking about how she would go crazy if something wasn't done about this problem. Then she came up with an idea. If she could get Gwen into a position that both were comfortable with, they would stop getting at each others necks.

Gwen was walking though the woods unknowing of what was about to come. Heather was sneaking around after her waiting for an operrtunity to put her plan into motion. Finally, Gwen got tiered and fell asleep. Heather then shot a dart at Gwen that hit. Gwen luckily didn't wake up. She was however getting shorter by the second until she reached 2 feet and 6 inches in hight. Heather then rushed to Gwen and picked her up, carrying her over her solider.

Gwen woke up next morning after a good nights sleep. But she woke up to Heather's face, oddly though it was bigger than yesterday. Gwen backed up and was shocked to see that Heather looked bigger in general than yesterday, " Hows my little Gwen today?" Heather asked like a mother would to her baby.

"Why are you talking to me like I was you're daughter" Gwen asked. "Because until the time we are on this island, I am you're mother. I shrank you to baby size last night and I am going to treat you like a baby in secret." Heather told Gwen. "Ok, WHY DID YOU SHRINK ME AND WHY ARE YOU GOING TO TREAT ME LIKE A BABY!?" Gwen demanded.

"I want to end our feud. So I decided if we both are in a place that we are both happy in, we can get along. I always wanted to be a mother and I will treat you like I would my own baby." Heather said. "Like a rotten bitch with a mean ataduide?" Gwen asked in a bad tone. "No silly willy, nice and with a good addatude" Heather replied.

"And first i will
112.title: Heather has a NICE side!?

1123.title: Something else

133.content:
*Note: This story takes place during the hide-and-seek challenge of Season 1 episode...I dunno.

With the challenge already begun, Gwen knew that she needed to think like she'd never thought before in order to survive it. Ordinary Chef was crazy enough, but a Chef armed with what essentially amounted to a portable water cannon was almost impossibly nuts! And then she spied it: a thin layer of moss growing over a small, round hillock. That gave her an idea. Working slowly yet carefully, she lifted said layer of moss from the rocks it clung to and draped it over herself, essentially allowing herself to become just another hill.

To the untrained eye, that is. What Gwen didn't know was that the spores from this moss tended to have strange effects on whatever creatures happened to breathe them in. (Chris knew of all this, of course, which is specifically why he chose such an out-of-the-way location as Camp Wawanakwa for the show.) The longer she spent under the coat of moss, the more spores she inhaled. And they were having a drastic effect on her body.

It started out as a simple sudden bagginess in her clothes. She kept having to subtly maneuver her arms to insure that her skirt was being pulled up, yet she wasn't being obvious about it. Soon even her shoes felt too big, and her sleeves draped over her hands. The moss cover seemed to grow bigger and bigger over her, when in reality it was she who was growing smaller.

It was only when everything below her waist slid off and her bra cups no longer contained her A-Cup breasts that Gwen knew something was definitely not right. But she was too late. It was as if her realization had triggered an explosive bout of shrinking. Her remaining clothes soon fell ober her, leaving her naked under a pile of fabric.

Gwen struggled to reach the edge of the moss cover before things got any worse. Just as she reached it, measuring only 6 inches tall at this point and completely naked, a thundrous series of stomps shook the earth around her. She peeked her head out from under the moss, enjoying the fresh air in spite of her predicament.

Who's shoes did she see?
133.title: 6 inch Gwen

1331.content: Gwen looks up & sees Heather staring at her.She picks her up & puts her in her pocket.Heather goes into a cave & pulls Gwen out of the pocket.She smiles & says"Gwen I must confess something,I want you all to my self I love you Gwen your going to live with me forever,I don't care about the money as long as I have you I'm complete."Gwen was getting scared so heather decided to.......................
1331.title: heather loves gwen?!?!?

13312.content:
So there they were. Together. In this totally romantic... cave.

Heather just sat there, holding the tiny Gwen in her lap. Meanwhile Gwen was confused. Didn’t this chick hate her? Why the sudden change?

But then things took a turn for the weird when heather started pulling her shorts down.

“I’ll be gentle, okay?” She made sure to ask before lowering Gwen between her thighs. Gwen was about ready to scream, as the giantess’ pussy closed in, but then the bigger teen... kept her promise?

Holding the tiny Gwen close, she slowly, carefully rubbed the tiny girl against her sex. Her swollen clit worked its way between Gwen’s legs, and next thing she knew, the two of them were having weird, yet creative and unexpected sex. Never did Heather look like she was about to force Gwen into something unpleasant, never did any malice show in her actions. Why, if she didn’t know better, she could’ve sworn her old rival had changed entirely.

With a moan and a lurch, Heather’s grip on Gwen loosened, and she let the girl rest on her lower belly as she laid back, panting. “Ohh, that was awesome...”

Gwen just stared up at the giant teen. Sweaty, heaving, but practically glowing. What the hell had happened to her?

Either way, Gwen wasn’t complaining. No more petty rivalry it seemed. So what was a shrunken teenager to do with her giant friend?
13312.title: have sex with her

143.content:
Gwen Wakes up one morning just like any other day. The sun is shining in the window, and everyone ells is still asleep, so as usual She gets dressed, and sneaks out with her Sketchbook for a little Private Gwen Time Before everyone ells gets up and the chaos of everyday life on the Island begins.

She sneaks off, finds her favorite Rock to set on, and begins Drawing pics of what ever comes to her head. Then out of nowhere Cris comes out of the bushes “Hi Gwen. Have I got a surprise for you.” Gwen Roles her eyes “If its like all the other surprises you treat us to You can keep it.” Cris Grins Evilly and retorts “Oh, don t worry. Its like nothing You've ever seen. I promise you that.” Gwen sighs and turns her back to Cris “Wow, you found a new way to toucher us? Go you...” in her usual unenthusiastic tone. “Hold me down I think I'm gonna just for joy.” Cris Laughs “You know You should be a little nicer to me. This little gizmo Could mean the difference between a summer of fun or a living hell for you” She Clenches her teeth with anger and turns around “Are you threatening me? Listen here you jerk, You have done nothing but toucher and torment me and my friends ever since we made the mistake of sighing up for this half ass Joke of a realty show, So You just go ahead and bring on what ever you got in that empty head of yours. I've done a pretty good job at surviving so far.” Then she starts to storm off. Cris replys “Wow, temper, temper. If you apologize I'll forget all that and let you have the surprise anyway.” Gwen Turns back and Shouts “GET FUCKED FREEK!!” Cris Smirks “Fine if that the way you wanna be then I'll just show you what you passed up.” and pulls a Strange toy ray gun out of his pocket. “Lets reduse that attitude of yours a little shall we?” and Zaps her with it

Everything goes black and she wakes up.....
143.title: 6 inches....

info.brief_description: Gwen shrinks and Heather finds her, what will happen?  You decide.
info.description:
While wandering the camp Gwen passes out and wakes up shrunk. The person that finds her is her rival Heather. You choose the story type there can be anything from gentle to mean. I'l allow sex, but don't jump into it even if you choose mean work your way into it. Cursing is fine by me, I don't like vore and gore sorry guys. No killing Gwen and she can only be found by Heather, but that doesn't mean she can't interact with the other campers. Not to much male interaction some's ok, but have it work back to Heather or another female camper.

Story Types.

1) Maternal - Babying pretty much. Could be for humilation or maybe Heather always wanted to be a mom maybe Heather has a fetish for seeing women in diapers I don't know, but this story line deals with Gwen being diapered and babied.

2)Gentle(non-love) - Heather is just nice no sex or making out here, but if you don't like that and just want to go for a nice non-sexual interaction this is the best story line for you.

3)Gentle(love) - Heather admits to a crush on Gwen, and it leads from there. Gwen doesn't have to feel the same way, at first. She could be coaxed into it with time though. This one will probably be OOC but its a story so yeah its bound to happen. This one would lead to sex making out and the other good stuff. This one doesn't have to be all gentle same with non love it can have a bit of harshness in it, but it'll just have to lead back to Heather being nice to Gwen.

4)Mean - Think I'd leave this one out? You know the drill right, she can do whatever she wants. In this one she could take advantage of her size for anything from a sex toy to a teddy bear. In this Gwen is basically a toy to Heather, though it can eventually lead to a love confession from Gwen in this one keep it on track until soemthing like that happens. Even then a change of heart might not be necessary she might lighten up though.


Those are your choices. Keep with the choice's original concept. Write with the mind of a person man not a sex fiend. If there's a love confession then have Heather lighten up even it's mean. As with anything what starts out as a tortre or a punishment or the Maternal diaper thing Gwen can grow to like it if you so choose. Spelling and grammer won't be looked for to much, but try to keep it nice looking a few spelling mistakes are cool, and I'm not gonna look for mistakes constantly I might do a touch up in grammer and spelling, but I won't delete. Try not to have to many one sentence chapters and no infinate choices please.

HAVE FUN MAN!
